title.narrative: Ceara Regional Economic Development: Cidades do Ceara

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to promote economic development, improve urban infrastructure, and enhance regional management capacity in the Central Cariri Region of Ceará, which includes the nine municipalities of Barbalha, Caririaçu, Crato, Farias Brito, Jardim, Juazeiro do Norte, Missão Velha, Nova Olinda, and Santana do Cariri.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, I.A.1 (a) | Description :establishment of UGP no later than two months from the effective dateestablish | Due Date :04-Jan-2010
Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, I.A.1 (b) | Description :Establishment of a consultative committee within two months fromeffectiveness | Due Date :09-Sep-2009

Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, I.B.1 (b) | Description :Prior to initiating bidding for works for the regional landfill theborrower will enter into the landfill agreement with the CRAJUBAR municipalities | Due Date :31-Dec-2010
Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, I.D (a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g) | Description :Adoption of the operational manual (satisfactory tothe Bank), by the borrower. | Due Date :09-Dec-2009
Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, I.E.1 (a) | Description :when applicable under the Ressetlement Policy Framework prepare and carryout ressetlement plans approved by the Bank | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement: Schedule 2,I.B.1.a | Description :Prior to initiating bidding for works under Part I of the Project, enter intoagreement with DER | Due Date :30-Jun-2009

Finance Agreement: Schedule 2,I.B.2 | Description :Prior to initiating the bidding process for the benefit of any projectmunicipality (3 months after effectiveness)the borrower will enter into an Implementation Agreement with each Project municipality| Due Date :05-Oct-2009
Finance Agreement: Schedule 2,I.B.3 | Description :Business plan, satisfactory to the bank, will be required for the Geopark. |Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: People provided with access to “improved sanitation facilities” - urban
Percentage of actions from the Integrated Sustainable Tourism Development Plan specified in the Annual Budget Law of the State or Municipalities
# of meetings held by the Project Consultative Committee
Completion of Sao Jose Seminary area improvement
People provided with access to "improved sanitation facilities” under the proj.
Number of families removed from risk areas in Bairro Seminário
Number of municipal officials in the Cariri region benefiting from training financed by the project

comment.narrative: This indicator replaces the indicator “Number of courses on public management offered by Project to municipal officials” to moreprecisely document the scope of training activities carried out.

title.narrative: % reduction average morning peak hour travel time between defined action points in central Juazeiro
Adoption of a new management model based on the Geopark Business Plan

comment.narrative: The measurement of this indicator has changed from percentage-based to binary to more closely reflect the idea of the use of theindicator in the context of the evolving needs of the PMU.

title.narrative: Establishment of regional consortium for landfill
Project monitoring reports being generated and analyzed quarterly
Operationalization of a Regional management model for the Central Cariri.

comment.narrative: The definition of the management model (established in the PAD) will be modified as follows: (i) Consultative Committeeestablishedand roles defined; (ii) regular meetings of the Consultative Committee (every four months); (ii) Metropolitan MasterPlan developedand ratified by the Committee

actual.value: Consultative Committee established, with irregular meetings.

title.narrative: % increase in number of tourists that visit Cariri Central per month/year
